/cm/shared/apps/gcc/4.8.1/bin/g++   -std=c++11 -Wall -pedantic -Wno-long-long -Wno-variadic-macros -fpermissive -O2 -march=native    CMakeFiles/taxknife.dir/taxknife.cpp.o CMakeFiles/taxknife.dir/src/taxontree.cpp.o CMakeFiles/taxknife.dir/src/taxonomyinterface.cpp.o CMakeFiles/taxknife.dir/src/ncbidata.cpp.o  -o taxknife  -L/mnt/HA/opt/boost/openmpi/gcc/64/1.57.0/lib -rdynamic /mnt/HA/opt/boost/openmpi/gcc/64/1.57.0/lib/libboost_program_options.so /mnt/HA/opt/boost/openmpi/gcc/64/1.57.0/lib/libboost_system.so /mnt/HA/opt/boost/openmpi/gcc/64/1.57.0/lib/libboost_filesystem.so -Wl,-rpath,/mnt/HA/opt/boost/openmpi/gcc/64/1.57.0/lib
